translation.en: And that's why I named my eighth poodle -after my fourth husband. -[audience laughs]
translation.zh:
‎那就是为什么我给第八只贵宾犬
‎起的名字是我第四任丈夫的名字

translation.en: That's great, Dorothy,
but you know the ding just means the passenger seat belt sign is off,
translation.zh:
‎但是你知道那叮的一声
‎只是表示安全带的灯灭了

translation.en: not that it's time to share.
-[audience laughs] -Not in my day! [chuckles]
So, what brings you to Tampa, Lola?
translation.zh: ‎你为什么会来坦帕 洛拉？

translation.en: Um, I'm actually moving there to live with my dad.
translation.zh: ‎我其实是要搬到那里和我爸爸住

translation.en: He just retired.
Oh! What did he do?
He was kind of an entertainer.
Ooh... Like Celine Dion?
-[crowd cheers] -[announcer] Look at that!
[announcer 2] The Big Show has won -the US title! -[sparks hiss]
translation.zh:
‎大秀哥赢得了
‎世界职业摔角的美国冠军

translation.en: -[rock music stops abruptly] -Yep, just like Celine Dion.
translation.zh: ‎是的 就像席琳迪翁一样

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -If Celine Dion ate an entire Vegas buffet -of Celine Dions. -[audience laughs]
translation.zh:
‎如果席琳迪翁在维加斯
‎吃了整个席琳迪翁的助餐

translation.en: So now your dad's retired, what is he doing?
translation.zh: ‎你爸爸退休了 那他现在干什么呢？

translation.en: I think he's got his hands in a lot of stuff.
Done, boom, yes!
-Dad, this is not a French braid. -[audience laughs]
Oh, man, I don't know why this is so hard.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 我不知道为什么这么难

translation.en: There's something wrong with your hair.
I used to braid Mick Foley's hair all the time.
translation.zh: ‎我以前一直是给米克福利编辫子

translation.en: And he loved it.
-[audience laughs] -I've said it before and I'll say it again.
translation.zh: ‎我以前说过 我要再说一遍

translation.en: Stop comparing me to Mick Foley.
-[audience laughs] -Good morning. How's my Big Show?
translation.zh: ‎早上好 我的大秀哥怎么样啊？

translation.en: And my little show... Oh.
[sighs] So, I went on this amazing run this morning
translation.zh: ‎今天早上跑步的感觉非常棒

translation.en: and I tried to jog through the Starbucks drive-through again.
translation.zh: ‎我又试着慢跑穿过星巴克的车道

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -Got into a real spicy conversation with the manager.
Long story short,
we are banned from that Starbucks.
translation.zh: ‎我们被禁止进入那家星巴克

translation.en: But that's my favorite Starbucks! They always sneak me day-old cake pops.
translation.zh:
‎但那是我最喜欢的星巴克！
‎他们总偷偷给我已经一天的棒棒蛋糕

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -[laughs] Well, if you wanna go there, you'll have to wear a disguise.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 如果你想去那里 你得伪装一下

translation.en: Look at me.
What kind of disguise could I possibly wear?
[scoffs] Shrek? Hulk? Kool-Aid Man? Giant potato?
translation.zh:
‎怪物史莱克 绿巨人
‎酷爱饮料人 大土豆

translation.en: I could do this all day.
You know what, there's a Starbucks near the airport.
translation.zh: ‎去机场的路上有一家星巴克

translation.en: Ooh, yeah, about that, I can't go to the airport today
translation.zh: ‎关于这个 我今天不能和你一起

translation.en: to pick up Lola with you.
No! You have to!
Lola's not just visiting this time,
translation.zh:
‎洛拉这次不只是来看我们
‎她实际上是搬来和我们一起住

translation.en: she's actually moving in with us. Everything has to be perfect!
translation.zh:
‎洛拉这次不只是来看我们
‎她实际上是搬来和我们一起住 ‎-一切都要完美！
‎-会的 别担心

translation.en: -And it will be! Don't worry. -[audience laughs]
translation.zh:
‎-一切都要完美！
‎-会的 别担心

translation.en: Just you being there will be enough. [kisses]
No, it won't! I need you.
You class me up, Cassy.
You talked me out of wearing cargo shorts for our wedding.
translation.zh: ‎你说服我不要穿短裤参加我们的婚礼

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -But not to the reception.
-[audience laughs] -Look, I'm sorry I can't go with you, but I have a really good reason.
translation.zh:
‎听着 很抱歉我不能和你一起去
‎但我有一个很好的理由

translation.en: I finally got the Litman listing.
translation.zh: ‎我终于把利特曼的房子挂出去了

translation.en: The house where the old lady died? Isn't that place super haunted?
translation.zh:
‎死了老太太的房子？
‎那地方不是闹鬼吗？

translation.en: [scoffs] That's just a myth that turned out to be true.
translation.zh: ‎那只是一个事实证明是真的神话

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -Look, no one's ever been able to sell that place.
translation.zh: ‎听着 没人能把那房子卖出去

translation.en: I sell it, I finally get my face on a bus bench.
translation.zh:
‎我卖这房子
‎终于把我的脸放到了车站的长凳上

translation.en: You know, I've had my face on a bus bench.
translation.zh:
‎你知道吗
‎我的脸被放在过车站的长凳上

translation.en: It sucks. It's just butts, all day long.
translation.zh: ‎太糟糕了 只有屁股 一整天都是

translation.en: ADB. All Day Butts.
Can I go to the airport?
I love the smell of jet fuel in the morning.
translation.zh: ‎我喜欢早上飞机燃油的味道

translation.en: Uh, no, JJ, you can go to school.
I'm just psyched to be getting a big sister.
What are you talking about?
You already have a big sister. Me!
translation.zh: ‎你已经有一个姐姐了 我！

translation.en: Oh, my God, I am losing my identity.
translation.zh: ‎哦 天哪 我正在失去我的身份

translation.en: Guys, MSS is a legit problem.
translation.zh: ‎伙计们 二综症是个严重的问题

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -MSS?
Middle Sister Syndrome.
It's real and it affects one in three children
translation.zh: ‎这是真的 影响到三个孩子的家庭中

translation.en: -of three-children households. -[audience laughs]
Okay, I think we're being a little dramatic.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 我觉得我们有点夸张了

translation.en: Dramatic?
I am not dramatic.
Do you all really think that I'm dramatic?
Tell me right now or I will run away forever.
translation.zh: ‎现在告诉我 否则我就永远离家出走

translation.en: Nobody say anything, -let's see if she's bluffing. -[audience laughs]
translation.zh:
‎没人说什么
‎我们看她是不是在虚张声势

translation.en: Okay, we have a few minutes before school.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 我们上学前还有几分钟

translation.en: I think I know who will cheer you up, if you're game, Doctor Mandy.
translation.zh:
‎我想我知道谁会让你高兴
‎如果你胆子够大 曼迪医生

translation.en: Seriously? Do we have time?
Oh, we'll make time.
there's something terribly wrong with our patient!
translation.zh: ‎医生 我们的病人出了严重的问题！

translation.en: -[suspenseful music plays] -You just gave her the one dose, right?
translation.zh: ‎你刚给她一剂药了 是吗？

translation.en: [Big Show's gruff voice] Need more candy!
[yelling] Run! It's Giant JJ!
-[Cassy and Mandy scream] -[Big Show's gruff voice] Need more candy!
[Big Show's gruff voice] Need more candy!
[Big Show's gruff voice] Candy!
Okay, today's the day.
We gotta tell Mandy she's moving in with JJ,
translation.zh: ‎我们得告诉曼迪她得和JJ住一屋

translation.en: and give her room to Lola.
[sighs] Do we have to? She is scary.
Especially when she goes into silent mode.
translation.zh: ‎尤其是当她进入静音模式时

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -Please, I'm not scared of a tween.
translation.zh:
‎求你了
‎我一点都不害怕十来岁的孩子

translation.en: I'm only scared of two things:
mascots and shopping for jeans at Banana Republic.
translation.zh: ‎吉祥物和在香蕉共和国买牛仔裤

translation.en: Hey, what's up?
Mandy!
Your mom wants to talk to you.
-[audience laughs] -That is a straight up lie.
Okay.
I'm the dad and what I say goes. Lola's getting your room.
translation.zh:
‎我是爸爸 我说了算
‎洛拉要住在你的房间里

translation.en: You know, 'cause Lola's only spent summer vacations with us.
translation.zh:
‎你知道
‎因为洛拉只和我们一起度暑假

translation.en: You know, 'cause we promised she'd have her own room?
translation.zh:
‎你知道
‎因为我们答应过她会有自己的房间？

translation.en: Okay, great talk, honey. Love you!
translation.zh: ‎好吧 聊得不错 亲爱的 爱你！

translation.en: -[chuckles] That was tough to watch. -[door closes]
She crushed you.
-[audience laughs] -You need a hug?
Yes, please.
I know that sneeze.
-[audience laughs] -JJ!
Oh, hey, Dad.
So before you get upset, just hear me out.
translation.zh: ‎所以在你生气之前 听我说完

translation.en: -I got nothing. -[audience laughs]
I just wanted to come pick up Lola with you.
translation.zh: ‎我只是想和你一起来接洛拉

translation.en: "Aw, JJ! That's so sweet!"
-[audience laughs] -You can't do your own reaction.
And you can't skip school.
You're in a lot of trouble, young lady.
I brought a confetti cannon.
You're in a little less trouble, young lady. Come on!
translation.zh: ‎你的麻烦少了一点 小姐 来吧！

translation.en: -[music fades] -Hey!
[stammering] You're that wrestler guy.
John Cena.
-[audience laughs] -John Cena?
Do I look like a guy that wakes up twice a night to moisturize?
translation.zh:
‎我看起来
‎像每晚醒来两次做保湿的人吗？

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -Dude, this is The Big Show.
Yes, I'm a huge fan!
Officer Lance Johnson.
Can I have your autograph?
Hit the bricks, Johnson. My dad's a busy man.
translation.zh:
‎走开约翰逊
‎我爸是个大忙人

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -[chuckling] No, I'm not.
It'd be my pleasure. I'd do anything for the police.
translation.zh:
‎那将是我的荣幸
‎我愿意为警察做任何事

translation.en: Anything?
Yeah, so my mom got this killer job and moved to Belgium.
translation.zh:
‎所以我妈妈找到了一份很好的工作
‎搬到了比利时

translation.en: Oh, so she's in the waffle industry?
translation.zh: ‎哦 那她是做华夫饼这行的？

translation.en: Don't think that's a thing. -Wish it was, though. -[audience laughs]
translation.zh:
‎我觉得不是
‎不过 希望是这样

translation.en: But, anyways, that's why I'm moving here.
translation.zh:
‎但不管怎么样
‎这就是我搬来这里的原因

translation.en: To live with my dad, stepmom and half sisters.
translation.zh:
‎和爸爸、继母
‎同父异母的妹妹住一起

translation.en: Well, that's a big change.
I'm actually super excited about it.
The weather is amazing.
My dad said I have my own room,
and there's a girl's hockey team at my new school.
translation.zh: ‎我的新学校有一支女子冰球队

translation.en: Oh, you play hockey?
Dorothy, I'm from Minnesota.
translation.zh: ‎多萝西 我来自明尼苏达州

translation.en: -We learn hockey before we learn math. -[Dorothy chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎还没学数学我们就学打冰球了

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -So, is your dad picking you up?
No, I'm just gonna Uber. I don't need anyone to pick me up.
translation.zh:
‎我打优步
‎我不需要任何人来接我

translation.en: Plus, I know
he would make a big deal out of-- Dad?
Hi, sweetie.
-[audience laughs] -Surprise.
What is happening?
-[camera shuttering] -Also, why is it happening?
-[audience laughs] -Ah, he wanted me to hold him like a baby. It happens sometimes with fans.
translation.zh:
‎他想让我像抱婴儿一样抱着他
‎有时候粉丝会这样的

translation.en: I know I'm a cop, but I've never felt so safe.
translation.zh:
‎我知道我是警察
‎但我从来没有感觉这么安全过

translation.en: Welcome to Tampa, Lola!
Hey, JJ!
-[music fades] -Lola, hi!
-You cut your hair. -Cassy!
-You noticed. -[Cassy chuckles]
I noticed, too.
It's rounder and hairier.
-[audience laughs] -I just didn't say anything. -Because I'm lying. -[audience laughs]
translation.zh:
‎我什么也没说
‎因为我在撒谎

translation.en: Where are your bags?
The airline's lost 'em.
The guy at the counter did say they would be delivered today.
translation.zh: ‎柜台的人说今天就可以送到

translation.en: He did put today in quotes and then laughed directly in my face,
translation.zh:
‎他把今天加了引号
‎然后当着我的面就笑了

translation.en: and said, "This is why I don't fly."
translation.zh: ‎然后说：“这就是我不飞的原因”

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -Airlines, am I right?
And don't even get me started on the food.
translation.zh: ‎他们甚至都没让我开始吃东西

translation.en: Don't worry, you can borrow my pajamas.
translation.zh: ‎别担心 你可以借我的睡衣

translation.en: Thanks!
But, on the plus side, I'm excited to see my new room.
translation.zh:
‎但是从好的方面来说
‎我很兴奋地想看看我的新房间

translation.en: Oh! Fun story about that.
translation.zh: ‎关于这个 有个有趣的故事

translation.en: You're doing a sit-in? That's right.
Like my heroes RBG, AOC and Leslie Knope.
translation.zh:
‎就像我的英雄鲁思贝德金斯伯格
‎亚历山大奥卡西奥科斯和莱斯利诺普

translation.en: Again, not a real person.
I am exercising my right to protest against oppressive forces.
translation.zh:
‎我在行使我的权利
‎抗议压迫势力

translation.en: In this case, you.
-[audience laughs] -Hey, Lola.
So excited you're here. Love your hair.
translation.zh:
‎你在这里真是太让我兴奋了
‎爱你的头发

translation.en: Thanks! Love your sit-in.
-[audience laughs] -This is nothing.
Wait till you see what I've got planned next.
translation.zh: ‎你等着看我的下一步计划吧

translation.en: This revolution will not be televised, it will be live-streamed.
translation.zh:
‎这场革命不会在电视上播出
‎会在线直播

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -Hi, guys!
[Mandy] Mom, Dad, this footage will be used in court
translation.zh:
‎妈妈、爸爸
‎这段录像将在法庭上使用

translation.en: when I decide to daughter-divorce you both.
translation.zh: ‎当我决定断绝与父母的关系时

translation.en: It'll probably win an Oscar, and I won't be thanking you in my speech.
translation.zh:
‎可能会赢得奥斯卡奖
‎我不会在演讲中感谢你们的

translation.en: Oh yes, you will be thanking us, or you're grounded.
translation.zh: ‎你会感谢我们的 否则你不可以出去

translation.en: Wait, what am I saying? This is not real.
translation.zh:
‎等等 我在说什么？
‎这不是真的

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -Lola can bunk with me. It'll be fun.
translation.zh: ‎洛拉可以和我睡 一定会很有趣的

translation.en: FYI, I sleep walk, sleep talk and sleep eat.
translation.zh:
‎供你参考 我睡觉走路
‎睡觉说话、睡觉吃饭

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -And if I hit a juice box
after seven, get ready for some sleep peeing.
translation.zh: ‎如果我七点后喝了果汁 ‎做好尿床的准备吧

translation.en: [chuckles] I know I promised you you'd get your own room, and you will,
translation.zh:
‎我知道我答应过你会有自己的房间
‎你会有的

translation.en: but would you mind bunking with JJ for now?
I guess I don't have a choice.
So, do you ever actually sleep-sleep?
I'll sleep-sleep when I die.
Hustle don't stop, bro.
translation.zh: ‎生命不息折腾不止 老兄

translation.en: Welcome to the JJ Dome!
I gotta say,
loving the vibe in here.
Thanks, I had a vision.
-[audience laughs] -Super psyched you're here.
Make yourself comfortable.
And I want you to know,
mi casa es su casa.
Except for mi legos, mi legos are not su legos.
translation.zh:
‎除了我的乐高
‎我的乐高不是你的乐高

translation.en: They are mine.
-[audience laughs] -Mine. Mine...
How's it going in the JJ Dome?
It's okay.
Lola, I know we're off to a shaky start, but I promise I'll make it up to you.
translation.zh:
‎洛拉 我知道开头不太好
‎但我保证我会补偿你的

translation.en: It's not that shaky.
I mean, I don't have any of my own stuff,
translation.zh: ‎我是说 我没有自己的东西

translation.en: I'm sleeping in my stepmom's pajamas
on the top bunk of a kiddie disco -so I don't get peed on. -[audience laughs]
translation.zh:
‎睡在儿童迪斯科舞厅的上铺
‎这样我就不会被尿到了

translation.en: -Yes, a little shaky. -Super shaky.
-[audience laughs] -But, hey, tomorrow's a brand new day, new school, new friends.
translation.zh:
‎但是 明天是全新的一天
‎新的学校、新的朋友

translation.en: New girl's hockey team. Super excited about that.
translation.zh:
‎-新冰球队
‎-我对这个感到非常兴奋

translation.en: Once I get back on the ice, it'll feel like home.
translation.zh: ‎一到冰上 我就感觉像在家一样

translation.en: I'm just so happy you're here. [kisses]
I'm happy too.
Okay, all right! We're doing this.
Oh. Forgot to mention.
I get 50% of any tooth fairy money.
You can talk to your guy, but trust me, -it's a standard contract. -[audience laughs]
translation.zh:
‎你可以和你的人谈谈 但相信我
‎这是一份标准合同

translation.en: This is all of Mandy's homework.
You sure you're okay with her missing school?
translation.zh: ‎你确定你对她没来学校没意见吗？

translation.en: Oh, everyone knows about the sit-in.
In fact, we excused most of our class to join in.
translation.zh:
‎事实上
‎我们准许班上大部分同学请假参加

translation.en: Look at the live stream.
We encourage our students to be civic thinking
translation.zh: ‎我们鼓励学生要有公民意识

translation.en: and aware of the power they have to control their own lives.
translation.zh: ‎以及意识到控制他们自己生活的力量

translation.en: Control their own lives?
Have you met my daughters?
JJ once borrowed a boat, got halfway to the Keys
translation.zh:
‎因为痴迷于花生酱果冻三明治
‎JJ有一次借了一艘船

translation.en: before she turned herself in, because she was, "Jonesing for a PB&J."
translation.zh:
‎在自首前都开到了
‎去佛罗里达礁岛的一半

translation.en: [yelling] Incoming chest bump!
-There you are! -[together] Boom!
Yeah!
Hey, how was your first day? It was great, right?
translation.zh:
‎你第一天过得怎么样？
‎棒极了 对吧？

translation.en: It was fine. Fine? Come on!
How about your classes? Where's your locker?
translation.zh: ‎上课怎么样？你的储物柜在哪里？

translation.en: Hey, do the bathrooms have those old urinals that go down to the floor?
translation.zh: ‎厕所里有旧的小便器 一直到地面？

translation.en: Wait, you're a girl.
-[audience laughs] -Honestly, it wasn't a great day.
It's 75 degrees outside,
and I'm still wearing winter clothes because my stuff is missing.
translation.zh:
‎我还穿着冬天的衣服
‎因为我的东西找不到了

translation.en: -The airlines called, they found the bags. -Great.
translation.zh:
‎航司打电话了
‎你的包找到了 ‎-很好
‎-在巴黎

translation.en: -In Paris. -[audience laughs]
Which you know is a great place for bags.
translation.zh: ‎你知道 对行李来说 那是个好地方

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -How does that help me? It doesn't.
-It doesn't at all. -[audience laughs]
Oh, also, there's no girls hockey team, which was pretty important to me.
translation.zh:
‎还有 没有女子冰球队
‎这对我来说很重要

translation.en: On the plus side,
I was up all night, because JJ also likes to sleep sing.
translation.zh:
‎我整晚都没睡
‎因为JJ也喜欢睡觉唱歌

translation.en: -I don't even know Italian. -[audience laughs]
[Big Show] I'm sorry, I just assumed there was a boys and girls team.
translation.zh: ‎对不起 我以为有男女混合冰球队

translation.en: I'll fix it. I'll talk to someone at school tomorrow.
translation.zh: ‎我会搞定的 ‎明天我来学校谈谈

translation.en: No, don't do that! I'll handle it.
translation.zh: ‎不要 别那么做 我自己来处理

translation.en: Aw, she gets huffy just like you.
Ugh. Whatever.
This isn't just a fight for the bedroom.
No! It's much more than that!
[loudly] It's a movement!
To quote Lin-Manuel Miranda's American Express commercial,
translation.zh: ‎引用林曼纽尔米兰达的美国运通广告

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -"We create the room where it happens."
translation.zh: ‎“我们创造了让一切发生的空间”

translation.en: And this is that room!
[Mandy] JJ!
-[indistinct chatter] -Where did all these kids come from?
This is all happening a lot quicker than I imagined.
translation.zh: ‎这一切发生得比我想象的要快得多

translation.en: Come here.
I put it on Dad's Twitter.
translation.zh: ‎我把它放在爸爸的推特上了

translation.en: Kids are coming from everywhere.
I'm charging 20 bucks a head.
You're charging 20 bucks?
This is a movement. You cannot profit from that!
translation.zh: ‎这是一场运动 你不能从中获利！

translation.en: You get two percent of the gate if you keep your mouth shut.
translation.zh: ‎我给你百分之二 如果你闭上嘴

translation.en: Ten percent, and you have to do my chores for a week.
translation.zh: ‎百分之十 你得替我做一个星期家务

translation.en: Seven, and I get first dibs
-on the bathroom in the morning. -Deal!
Ha! I would've settled for 9% and a go-gurt.
translation.zh: ‎我本可以接受百分之九 外加酸奶的

translation.en: You played yourself, girlie.
How's the haunted house going?
[sighs] Not great.
I found an exorcist on Craigslist,
translation.zh: ‎我在网上找到了一个驱妖师

translation.en: but turns out he's just a personal trainer who didn't know how to spell.
translation.zh:
‎但他只是个私人教练
‎还是个不知道怎么念咒的人

translation.en: So, what's going on with you?
You only ask me to shave your head when you need advice.
translation.zh:
‎你只有在需要建议的时候
‎才让我给你剃头

translation.en: I think I'm blowing it already with Lola.
I just wanted it to be perfect,
and everything's going wrong since the moment she landed.
translation.zh:
‎从她着陆的那一刻起
‎一切都出了问题

translation.en: Sweetie, she's only been here -like a couple days. -[sighs]
translation.zh: ‎亲爱的 她来这里才几天

translation.en: Why are you spinning out so much about this?
'Cause so long I've been a Facetime parent.
translation.zh: ‎因为我一直是个视频电话家长

translation.en: Now I'm a real time parent.
It's better than when you were a butt dial parent.
translation.zh: ‎这比以前你是个拨号父母强多了

translation.en: That was just four muffled minutes ordering off the dollar menu at Wendy's.
translation.zh:
‎那是在温迪饭馆从廉价菜单上点的
‎模模糊糊的四分钟

translation.en: -I spent a lot of dollars that night. -[laughs]
Look, you were always there for Lola, even if she didn't see you every day.
translation.zh:
‎听着 你总是支持洛拉
‎即使她不是每天都见到你

translation.en: Yeah, but now that she's here, I want her to feel like this is her home.
translation.zh:
‎是的 但现在她来了
‎我想让她觉得这是她的家

translation.en: And she will, she just needs time.
translation.zh: ‎她会的 她只是需要时间

translation.en: [sighs] Maybe if I can get her on the hockey team, things will turn around.
translation.zh:
‎也许如果我能让她加入冰球队
‎事情就会好转

translation.en: I wanted to talk to the coach, but Lola said I shouldn't.
translation.zh:
‎我想和教练谈谈
‎但洛拉说我不应该去

translation.en: Yep, she's right. Let her handle it.
translation.zh: ‎是的 她是对的 让她来处理

translation.en: I don't know, I think I can help.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道 我想我能帮上忙

translation.en: Show, listen to me and remember that I am holding a razor to your scalp.
translation.zh:
‎乔 听我说
‎记住我拿着的剃刀放在了你的头皮上

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -Do not go talk to the--
-Coach Fener? -[grunts]
[strained] Three, four...
-and five. -[door closes]
Ah, that burns right.
Dang, look at you.
What do you go, about 5'8? 5'9?
translation.zh: ‎你多高 一米七 一米七二？

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -[chuckles] Yeah, when I was like 11.
-[audience laughs] -Okay, what can I do you for, Big Gulp?
translation.zh: ‎好吧 我能为你做什么 大喘？

translation.en: I'm actually here about my daughter, Lola. She wants to play on the hockey team.
translation.zh:
‎我来这里是为了我女儿 洛拉
‎她想加入冰球队

translation.en: Yeah, [sighs] I'm gonna tell you the same thing I told her.
translation.zh: ‎我告诉你的会和告诉她的一样

translation.en: There aren't enough girls in Tampa who wanna play ice hockey.
translation.zh: ‎坦帕没有足够的女孩想打冰球

translation.en: Yeah, come on, there's gotta be some kind of a compromise?
translation.zh: ‎是啊 想想吧一定有什么妥协的办法

translation.en: -[chuckles] I don't compromise. -[audience laughs]
I come from a military family. [exhales] You think there's compromise in war?
translation.zh:
‎我来自一个军人家庭
‎你认为战争有妥协吗？

translation.en: -Yeah, that's literally how they end. -[audience laughs]
translation.zh: ‎是的 这就是战争结束的方式

translation.en: Listen, Double Stuff!
-Don't call me Double Stuff. -Why?
'Cause I don't like it.
And when I don't like something, I break it.
translation.zh:
‎当我不喜欢什么的时候
‎我就弄碎它

translation.en: Are you threatening a military man?
No, I am threatening a P.E. teacher who shops at Baby Gap.
translation.zh:
‎不 我在威胁一个在GAP婴儿用品店
‎买东西的体育老师

translation.en: It's time to go.
Oh! [stammers] Before you do, could you actually hang this photo for me
translation.zh:
‎走之前
‎你能帮我把这张照片

translation.en: -up on the wall? [laughs] -[audience laughs]
Thank you so much, [inhales, lowers tone] Double Stuff.
I just don't wanna talk about it!
What was I supposed to do? Nothing!
Like I literally told you to do! Could not have been clearer!
translation.zh:
‎就像我告诉你的那样！
‎再清楚不过了！

translation.en: What happened?
I just talked to the coach.
Talk? I wish you just talked!
-[audience laughs] -Ah, come on, man! This is not cool!
translation.zh: ‎得了 伙计 这并不酷

translation.en: Hey, sweetie.
Oh, him?
-He was like that when I got here. -[audience laughs] Let's go, quickly.
translation.zh:
‎我来的时候他就是那样
‎我们走吧 快点

translation.en: Good news is coach changed his mind. I had nothing to do with it.
translation.zh:
‎好消息是教练改变了主意
‎我和这事没关系

translation.en: -So there's a girl's team now? -Nope.
-Oh, no. -Yep.
-[audience laughs] -What? The coach is gonna let her try out for the boys team.
translation.zh: ‎什么？教练会让她去男队试练一下

translation.en: I mean, it's 2020, what about RBG and ABC, and all that feminist stuff?
translation.zh:
‎我是说都2020年了 那些女性主义
‎像露丝拜德金斯伯格、ABC怎么样？

translation.en: It's AOC!
ABC is what old people watch when they don't know how to find YouTube.
translation.zh:
‎ABC是老年人不知道
‎怎么上YouTube时看的

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -That totally tracks, I've done that.
And a girl on a boys team is so played out.
translation.zh: ‎女孩在男队里一点用都没有

translation.en: Every time I get on the ice,
the guys are afraid to check me, or they don't pass me the puck.
translation.zh:
‎那些家伙不敢拦截我
‎或者不把球传给我

translation.en: So show those stupid boys you're better than them.
translation.zh: ‎让那些蠢小子看看 你比他们强

translation.en: I will!
I'm gonna go to that tryout tomorrow and kill it.
translation.zh: ‎明天去参加试练 我要拿到机会

translation.en: But if I'm gonna be on the boys team, I wanna earn it my way.
translation.zh:
‎但如果我要加入男队
‎我想用我的方式来获得机会

translation.en: By myself!
You don't have to do it by yourself anymore.
Yes, I do.
That's how I work.
Now if you'll excuse me, I'm gonna go up to my room.
translation.zh: ‎现在请原谅我 我要回我的房间了

translation.en: Oh, wait! I don't have one.
What? He called me Double Stuff.
-[audience laughs] -Show, I specifically told you not to do anything.
translation.zh: ‎乔 我明确告诉过你不要做任何事

translation.en: I know, you're right, but in my defense, I did not listen to you.
translation.zh:
‎我知道 你是对的
‎但我的辩解是 我没听你的

translation.en: -[mellow music playing] -[phone chimes]
Hey, I, uh, didn't know you were out here.
Yeah, I just, needed some privacy.
translation.zh: ‎我只是 需要一些个人空间

translation.en: You hear about Dad and Coach Fener?
translation.zh: ‎你听说爸爸和费纳教练的事了吗？

translation.en: Oh, yeah.
I heard Dad punched Coach Fener so hard in the stomach,
translation.zh: ‎我听说爸爸狠狠打了费纳教练的肚子

translation.en: he went from an outtie to an innie.
translation.zh: ‎他把鼓出来的肚子打回去了

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -What? No, that's not what happened.
But, is Dad always like this?
Look, he means well, and his heart's in the right place.
translation.zh: ‎他用意是好的 而且他心地善良

translation.en: He just can't control himself.
He's like a giant puppy in a house of bacon.
translation.zh: ‎他就像只在培根房子里的巨大小狗

translation.en: Hey, where were you?
Oh, I was just hanging out at none of your business.
-[audience laughs] -What's up?
We were just talking about Dad.
I heard he crushed Coach F, and now he has to poop into a bag.
translation.zh:
‎我听说他狠狠打了费纳教练
‎现在他不得不用粪袋了

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -What? No, he just hung him up on the wall like a stuffed marlin.
translation.zh:
‎什么 不是的  他只是
‎把他像个毛绒马林鱼一样挂在墙上了

translation.en: Wow, this story has gotten out of control.
translation.zh: ‎哇 这个故事已经失控了

translation.en: [sighs deeply] And so has this sit-in.
I need this to be over, but I can't cave to mom and dad.
translation.zh:
‎我要结束这一切
‎但我不能对爸爸妈妈让步

translation.en: It sets a bad precedent.
Mandy, if I can get them to cave, can I please have the room?
translation.zh:
‎曼迪 如果我能让他们让步
‎我能住在你的房间里吗？

translation.en: I could really use my own space for right now.
translation.zh: ‎我现在就真的可以用自己的地方

translation.en: Yes, the kids in my room suck!
They keep recommending podcasts about natural deodorant to me.
translation.zh:
‎他们不断向我推荐
‎有关天然除臭剂的播客

translation.en: What are we gonna do?
We just have to escalate and manipulate things
translation.zh: ‎我们只需要升级和操纵事情

translation.en: where they have no choice but to cave.
translation.zh: ‎他们别无选择 只能让步

translation.en: Manipulate?
Now you're talking my language.
-[audience laughs] -I need 50 bucks, Mom and Dad's passports,
translation.zh: ‎我要50块 爸爸妈妈的护照

translation.en: and you two ding-dongs to keep your mouth shut.
translation.zh: ‎还有叽叽喳喳的你们俩闭上嘴

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -Okay, we're not doing whatever that is,
translation.zh: ‎不管什么 反正我们都不会做的

translation.en: but I do have a plan.
I'm so glad you're here, Lola.
translation.zh: ‎我很高兴你在这儿 洛拉

translation.en: See? I love this.
With you here, Lola, we outnumber them.
translation.zh:
‎你在这里 洛拉
‎我们的人数超过了他们的

translation.en: We'll always get our way. As long as we have each other's backs.
translation.zh: ‎我们总会赢的 只要我们互相支持

translation.en: Sister to sister to sister.
-JJ, put my wallet back in my pocket. -[audience laughs]
translation.zh: ‎JJ 把钱包放回我的口袋里

translation.en: You know I had to try.
-[whistle blows] -[Coach F] Yeah! Nice!
Nice shot!
-Nice! Move those skates! -[sticks clatter]
-[skates hiss on ice] -Very nice!
Mom told us to stay in the car.
-[giggles] We were never doing that. -[audience laughs]
-[Coach F] And shoot! -[punk clanks]
Ah, come on!
Lola was totally right. The boys won't play her straight up.
translation.zh:
‎洛拉完全正确
‎男孩们不会和她正面交手

translation.en: There has to be a way to show them she's tough and can take it.
translation.zh:
‎一定有办法让他们知道
‎她很厉害 能承受的

translation.en: Oh, no. I can see it in your eyes.
translation.zh: ‎不 我能从你的眼睛里看出来

translation.en: Something cray-cray is about to happen.
-[audience laughs] -And whatever it is, I'm capital I-N-N, in.
translation.zh: ‎不管发生什么 我都要加入入

translation.en: You do know that "in" is spelled with one "N"?
translation.zh: ‎你真的知道“加入”只有一个“入”吧？

translation.en: You took me out of school for this. That's on you, homeboy.
translation.zh:
‎你为了这个把我带出学校
‎你得负责 老兄

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -Good point.
I know I've done everything wrong since Lola got here.
translation.zh:
‎我知道自从洛拉来到这里
‎每件事我都做错了

translation.en: If she wants to do this her way,
translation.zh: ‎如果她想用自己的方式去做

translation.en: I gotta fix this.
-[indistinct yelling] -My way.
Alright, get some water. Back on the ice in five.
translation.zh:
‎好了 去喝点水
‎五分钟后回到冰上

translation.en: There you go.
Oh, no, he's back.
He's bigger. Somehow he's getting bigger.
translation.zh:
‎他更大了
‎不知道为什么他越来越大了

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -No, he's just getting closer to me.
translation.zh: ‎不 他只是离我越来越近了

translation.en: -What are you doing here? -Check me.
What? No!
Check me in the boards, knock me on my butt!
translation.zh:
‎把我撞到板子上
‎踢我的屁股

translation.en: Show them what you can do! I'm not gonna hit you.
translation.zh:
‎-告诉他们你能做什么！
‎-我不会打你的

translation.en: God, can't you ever just leave me alone?
translation.zh: ‎天哪 你就不能离我远点吗？

translation.en: No, I'm not going away. I wasn't there for you for so many years.
translation.zh:
‎不 我不会走的
‎这么多年来我都不在你身边

translation.en: And I'm never doing that again. I'm in your life, whether you like it
translation.zh: ‎我再也不会那么做了 ‎不管你喜不喜欢 我都在你的生命中

translation.en: or not. If you want me
translation.zh: ‎不管你喜不喜欢 我都在你的生命中 ‎如果你想让我走 你就得逼我走

translation.en: to go away, you're gonna have to make me.
translation.zh: ‎如果你想让我走 你就得逼我走

translation.en: Unless you're too scared.
-[audience laughs] -Oh, boy.
-[Big Show screams in pain] -[all cheering] Yeah!
-[helmet thuds] -Dad! You okay? I'm sorry.
[struggling] Oh, I'm the one that should be sorry.
I just wanted everything to be perfect for you.
translation.zh: ‎我只是希望一切对你来说都很完美

translation.en: I wanted you to feel like you were home.
You know what's weird?
Slamming you into the boards has kind of been the first moment
this has felt like home.
-Ah, that was my plan all along. -Really?
-[audience laughs] -No, I'm making this stuff up as I go.
translation.zh: ‎不是 我做的时候才想到的

translation.en: This is all gonna get easier, right?
translation.zh: ‎一切都会变得更容易 对吧？

translation.en: I sure hope so, I'm not gonna be able to walk for a week.
translation.zh: ‎希望如此 我一个星期都不能走路了

translation.en: But I promise, in the future, I'll wait till you asked for help.
translation.zh:
‎但我保证 以后我会等你请求帮助时
‎才帮你

translation.en: And I promise to think about asking for your help. [laughs]
-[audience laughs] -Deal.
That was awesome.
Okay, what I'm gonna need is for us to do it one more time.
translation.zh: ‎为了我们 我需要再来一次

translation.en: I'd love to get it in slo-mo.
[Cassy] We will come down on the price of the house.
[scoffs] No, there aren't ghosts, there is a ghost.
translation.zh: ‎不 那儿没有很多鬼 有一个鬼

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -It's an old lady in a Victorian nightgown. If anything, it classes up the place.
translation.zh:
‎是一位穿着维多利亚式睡衣的老太太
‎如果有什么的话 这个地方会封了的

translation.en: Hello?
-So, how'd it go? -[door closes]
Good! I stayed in the car the whole time. JJ sent me the video.
translation.zh:
‎-很好！我一直呆在车里
‎-JJ把视频发给我了

translation.en: [sighs] You ratted me out to Mom?
She promised me a Nintendo Switch if I flipped.
translation.zh:
‎她答应我如果我叛变
‎她给我买任天堂游戏机

translation.en: And I want that Switch, baby.
translation.zh: ‎我想要那个游戏机 亲爱的

translation.en: Good news, Lola. Your bags have arrived.
translation.zh: ‎好消息 洛拉 你的包到了

translation.en: [exhales] Finally! Yes, all right!
Things are starting to turn around for the old...
-Zane Rutlidge from Detroit, Michigan. -[audience laughs]
translation.zh: ‎密歇根州底特律的赞恩鲁特利奇

translation.en: These are not my bags.
You know, sometimes, we don't get the bags we want,
translation.zh: ‎你知道 有时候我们得不到想要的包

translation.en: but we get the bags we need.
-[audience laughs] -What does that mean? I don't know, I was just trying to help.
translation.zh:
‎-那是什么意思？
‎-我不知道 我只是想帮忙

translation.en: You know what? It's cool. They'll get here eventually.
translation.zh: ‎你知道吗？很酷 包最终会到的

translation.en: -[indistinct chatter] -[Cassy] Who are those kids?
They're from Orlando.
Ugh. I hate kids from Orlando. -They got that Disney stink on 'em. -[audience laughs]
translation.zh:
‎我讨厌奥兰多的孩子
‎他们带有迪斯尼的吵闹

translation.en: Mandy's protest is blowing up on Twitter.
translation.zh: ‎曼迪的抗议活动在推特上迅速升温

translation.en: This thing is getting huge.
Is that a drum circle?
[groans] I cannot stand drum circles! They're never in rhythm.
translation.zh:
‎我受不了鼓圈！
‎他们从来没有个调

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -Girls, go upstairs.
Babe, I think we have to cave. To cave? No, no.
translation.zh:
‎-宝贝 我想我们得让步了
‎-让步？

translation.en: No, no, no.
I won't cave.
I will hold the line to the end of days.
I was once in a three-hour standoff with an old lady
translation.zh: ‎我曾经和一位老太太僵持了三个小时

translation.en: for a parking spot in front of TJ Maxx.
translation.zh: ‎就是为了折扣店前面的停车位

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -I will never, ever,
ever,
-[gruff] ever, cave. -[audience laughs]
Hey... [sighs]
We're going to need mattresses, because my people want to sleep over.
translation.zh: ‎我们需要床垫 因为我的人想过夜

translation.en: And they're going to need to use your bathroom.
Okay, you win, you can keep the room.
translation.zh: ‎你赢了 你可以自己住你的房间

translation.en: Way to hold the line, Braveheart.
And now that I've won and proven my point,
translation.zh: ‎既然我赢了并且证明了我的观点

translation.en: I'll suspend the sit-in.
Lola can have the room.
Thank you.
Hey, Dad, remember the whole asking for help thing?
translation.zh: ‎爸爸 还记得整个求助的事吗？

translation.en: -Yeah? -Well, can you please help me
get these kids out of my new room?
translation.zh: ‎把孩子们弄出去我的新房间吗

translation.en: Oh, I thought you'd never ask.
[yelling] All right! I am bigger, stronger, -and balder than everyone in this room! -[audience laughs]
translation.zh:
‎好吧 我比这个房间里的每个人
‎都高大 强壮 头发少！

translation.en: If you are not related to me, or a dependent on my taxes,
translation.zh:
‎如果你和我没关系
‎或我不能申请抚养人纳税免税额的

translation.en: get out!
[screaming] Now!
God, I love helping.
-[music fades] -Hey, kiddo. Look, sorry again about the bags.
translation.zh: ‎孩子 关于包的事 我再次感到抱歉

translation.en: If you want, I can take you to the mall tomorrow,
translation.zh: ‎如果你愿意 明天我带你去商场

translation.en: buy you some new clothes.
What do you need, like, underwear, bras? I'm gonna have Cassy take you to the mall.
translation.zh:
‎你需要什么 比如内裤、 文胸？
‎我让凯西带你去商场

translation.en: -Good call. -[audience laughs]
Where did you find that?
It was in my bag. I didn't want it to break.
translation.zh: ‎在我的包里 我不想弄坏了

translation.en: You remember that day?
-Of course I remember that day. -[mellow music plays]
You spilled hot chocolate all over your pants,
translation.zh: ‎你把热巧克力洒得满裤子都是

translation.en: and then we made a life size Big Show snowman
translation.zh:
‎然后我们做了
‎一个真人大小的大秀哥雪人

translation.en: Biggest snowman ever. That sucker didn't melt till July.
translation.zh:
‎史上最大的雪人
‎那个家伙直到七月才融化

translation.en: -Are you gonna cry? -No!
Yes, but later when I'm in the bath.
translation.zh: ‎是的 但要等到我洗澡的时候

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -Come on, It's movie night.
We're having Mediterranean food.
-This hero needs some gyros. -[audience laughs]
Oh my God, was that a dad joke?
translation.zh: ‎天哪 那是爸爸的玩笑吗？

translation.en: I dunno, it's all Greek to me.
translation.zh: ‎不知道 我想都是希腊语

translation.en: Ooh, two in a row, you gotta go.
[imitating Mr. T] I "pita" the fool that does dad jokes!
translation.zh: ‎我“可怜”那个开爸爸式玩笑的傻瓜

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -Okay, seriously, get out!
-Love you! -Love you.
before we eat, you know the rules.
translation.zh: ‎吃饭之前 你们知道规矩的

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -Best part of your day, Mandy.
translation.zh: ‎一天中最美好的时光 曼迪

translation.en: Well, I have seven best parts.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 我有七件最好的事

translation.en: -Pick one, I'm hungry. -[audience laughs]
Today, I became the first middle sister to make real change in our world.
translation.zh:
‎今天 我成了第一个
‎真正改变我们世界的二姐

translation.en: That can't possibly be true, but carry on.
translation.zh: ‎这不可能是真的 但是继续

translation.en: Point is, I can't stop now.
translation.zh: ‎关键是 我现在停不下来了

translation.en: I can see my own future.
So, I have decided to run -for Lower School President. -[Cassy gasps]
translation.zh: ‎所以 我决定竞选初中主席

translation.en: Sick! I'm in. Rigging an election is on my bucket list.
translation.zh:
‎太棒了！我加入
‎操纵选举在我的愿望清单上

translation.en: That, and learning how to tie my shoes.
-[audience laughs] -You know, when I was your age, I was Lower School President in my school.
translation.zh:
‎你知道吗 当我像你这么大的时候
‎我是我们学校初中的主席

translation.en: -[Cassy and Mandy] No, you weren't. -Yes, I was!
[Mandy] That is crazy.
-[Mandy] No, I don't believe you. -[JJ] No...
translation.zh:
‎-我不相信你
‎-我知道 这是…

translation.en: I'm telling the truth. I actually got impeached.
translation.zh: ‎我说的是实话 我实际上被弹劾了

translation.en: -I'm telling the truth! -[Mandy] This seems like a joke.
translation.zh:
‎（妈妈：你真那么痛苦
‎我会想办法

translation.en: -[JJ] How? -I used to kick the soda machine,
translation.zh: ‎你可以来布鲁塞尔和我一起住）

translation.en: and it would spit sodas out, and I'd sell them on the bus ride home.
translation.zh:
‎汽水就会出来
‎在回家的公车上 我把汽水卖掉

translation.en: -[Cassy] How dare you? -[Big Show] I know.
translation.zh: ‎（洛拉：我爱你 但在这里很好）

translation.en: [Cassy and Big Show] Hey!
-You stole my gyro. -I stole your gyro.
translation.zh:
‎-你偷了我的烤肉
‎-我偷了你的烤肉

translation.en: Subtitle translation by
